## 1. Data

```{r}
# read data
load("../../data/full_data.RData")
full_data <- full_data %>% filter(sp_code == "ACERUB")
nb_mesure = full_data %>% nrow()
nb_epmatorg99 = full_data %>% filter(epmatorg == 99) %>% nrow()
```

```{r}
print(paste("Number of measures en tout :", nb_mesure))
print(paste("Number of measures with epmatorg = 99 :", nb_epmatorg99))
print(paste("soit", round(nb_epmatorg99/nb_mesure*100, 2), "%"))
```
